message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. This is a great starting point, and I'm confident we can work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am interested in discussing a price closer to my valuation. My counteroffer for the product is $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After further consideration, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far.
Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $870000 for the product.

I'm getting close to walking away from the deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $885000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. This is the best price I can offer, and I expect you to make a decision soon.
Given the situation, I would like to propose an offer of $875000 for the product.
I'm getting close to giving up on this deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $890000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. This is my final offer, and I expect you to make a decision soon.
Considering all factors, I would like to propose a final offer of $885000 for the product.
